title: Lucky Chocolates
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chocolate shop and cafe that offers cakes and sweets as well light food like panini and soup. Vegan choices include a few varieties of chocolates, cashew-based ice cream, non-dairy milks for hot chocolates, shakes, and smoothies. Many ingredients are gluten-free and organic. Free Wi-Fi.
